subtitle.en-US: I am a software engineer focused on front-end based in the New York City area.

content.value: I'm a software engineer based in NYC with a passion for front-end development and accessibility. I strive to create user-friendly, inclusive web experiences that everyone can enjoy. I have previously worked at design agencies, tech startups and fashion companies.
When I'm not coding, you'll likely find me training for my next marathon, listening to new music or diving into fascinating facts about lizards and exploring the unique world of reptiles. 🦎

shortDescription.en-US: TuneTrack is a personal concert diary, to record and relive live music experiences. Built with: Next.js, Tailwind, and Contentful

content.value: I can track the shows I've attended, capture the details of each performance, and build a timeline of my musical journey. Whether I'm a festival fanatic or a local gig enthusiast, TuneTrack helps me keep my concert memories alive, all in one place.
Built with: Next.js, Tailwind, and Contentful
Here are the features:
Concert Timeline:
View a chronological timeline of all the concerts I've attended, complete with dates, locations, and artists.
Setlist Archive:
Saved setlists from each concert, adding notes or personal highlights to remember every detail.
Favorite Moments:
Highlights of my favorite performances or moments from each concert with a star or heart feature.
Concert Wishlist:
A list of artists or upcoming shows I want to attend in the future.

shortDescription.en-US: Adopt-A-Pup is an app for finding dogs available for adoption in your area, including profiles, matching and search. Built With: Remix, Tailwind, Google Maps API, MongoDB

content.value: Adopt-A-Pup

is my go-to app for finding dogs available for adoption. I can easily search for dogs based on breed, size, age, or location, making it simple to find the perfect match. The app also lets me view detailed profiles of each dog, complete with photos and personality descriptions, so I can get a sense of their temperament before meeting them. I can save my favorite dogs to a personalized list, making it easy to keep track of potential matches. Plus, I receive notifications about new dogs that fit my preferences, ensuring I never miss out on finding my future furry friend.
Built With: Remix, Tailwind, Google Maps API, MongoDB

shortDescription.en-US: Chef's Table is the ultimate dinner party planning assistant. This app can plan every detail of a new gathering, from crafting the perfect menu to sending out invitations to friends. Built with: Vue.js, Yelp API, Firebase

content.value: Chef's Table

is my ultimate dinner party planning assistant. With this app, I can  plan every detail of my next gathering, from crafting the perfect menu to sending out invitations to my friends. I can explore a wide range of recipes and customize them to fit my guests' tastes and dietary restrictions.

Chef's Table also helps me manage allergies and special dietary needs. Plus, it provides easy-to-follow shopping lists and cooking timelines to make hosting a breeze. Whether it’s an intimate dinner or a festive celebration, Chef's Table makes every event a culinary success.
Built with: Vue.js, Yelp API, Firebase

shortDescription.en-US: Buy or Bye? is a fun quiz app that will help you determine if you should purchase the newest iPhone or wait until the next release. Build with React.js, Tailwind, MongoDB.

content.value: Buy or Bye?

is a fun and interactive quiz app designed to help you decide whether to buy the latest iPhone or wait for the next release. Built with React.js for a dynamic user experience, Tailwind for sleek and responsive design, and MongoDB for efficient data management, this app provides a series of engaging questions to assess your needs and preferences. By analyzing your responses,
Buy or Bye?

delivers personalized recommendations, guiding you on whether it's worth making a purchase now or holding out for the next model. It’s the perfect tool for tech enthusiasts looking to make informed decisions on their next big buy.

roles.name: Editor
roles.description: Allows editing, publishing and archiving of content

roles.name: Freelancer
roles.description: Allows only editing of content they created themselves

roles.name: Translator
roles.description: Allows editing of localized fields in the specified language
